DOC.brief_summary: Sarpogrelate ( MCI-9042 ) antiplatelet drug decrease 5-hydroxytryptamine ( 5-HT ) level platelet via blockade 5-HT2 receptor ; use atherosclerotic peripheral arterial disease . S-ACCESS randomized , double-blinded trial compare relative efficacy sarpogrelate ( 100mg three time daily ) aspirin ( 81mg daily ) 1510 patient recent cerebral infarction . Patients follow 0.9 3.5 year . The primary endpoint recurrence cerebral infarction ; relative safety also assess .
